article:
Push!
At midnight Peter was awakened by heavy knocks on the door. He rolled over and look to his   _  ,and it was half
past one. "I'm not getting  out of bed  at this time," he  _  to himself,
and rolled over.
Then, a  _  knock
followed. "Aren't you going to  _  it?" said his wife.
So he dragged himself out of bed and went downstairs. He opened the door and there was a man   _  at
the door. It didn't take long to  _  the man was drunk.
"Hi, there," slurred  the stranger, "Can you give me a push?"
"No, get lost. It's half past one. I was  in bed  ,"Peter said and slammed the door. He went back  _  to bed and told his wife what had happened.
She said, "That wasn't very  _  of
you. Remember that night we had a  breakdown  in the pouring rain on
the way to pick the kids up and you had to  knock on  that man's
door to get our car  _  again? What would have happened if
he'd told  us  to get lost?"
"But the guy was  _  ,"
said Peter.
"It doesn't matter," said the wife. "He needs help   _  it would be the Christian thing to help him."
So Peter went out of bed again, got dressed, and went downstairs. He opened the door, and not being able to see the stranger anywhere, he shouted, "Hey, do you still want a  _  ?"
And he heard a  _  ,"Yeah,
please."
So, still being unable to see the stranger, he shouted, "  _  are you?"
The drunk replied, "Over here, on the  _  ."
